com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Interface Solution

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassificationSolution
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParseConfiguration, PosTagSequence, TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence

    public interface Solution

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getScore()
      This solution's total score.
      ScoringStrategy getScoringStrategy()
      Get the scoring strategy for this solution.
      java.util.List<Solution> getUnderlyingSolutions()
      The solutions underlying this solution, in the case of several overlaid levels of abstraction, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        double getScore()
        This solution's total score.

      • getUnderlyingSolutions

        java.util.List<Solution> getUnderlyingSolutions()
        The solutions underlying this solution, in the case of several overlaid levels of abstraction, e.g. a syntax parse depends on an underlying pos-tagging solution, which itself depends on an underlying tokenising solution.

      • getScoringStrategy

        ScoringStrategy getScoringStrategy()
        Get the scoring strategy for this solution.

      • setScoringStrategy

        void setScoringStrategy(ScoringStrategy scoringStrategy)
